# nonceEndpointURL

**Instance Property**

The URL to retrieve a one-time use value from the server.

## Declaration

```swift
var nonceEndpointURL: URL { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property defaults to [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginConfiguration/tokenEndpointURL].

## Configuring the server nonce

- **customNonceRequestValues**: Custom values to add to the server nonce POST request body.
- **nonceResponseKeypath**: The keypath in the response that contains the one-time use value.
- **serverNonceClaimName**: The name of the claim to include in authentication requests.
